mapper.select: select U.MSGID ,U.SENDTYPE ,U.SCHTYPE ,U.SUBJECT ,U.SENDDATE ,U.MSGCNT ,U.MSGCONTENT ,T.SUCC_TOTAL ,T.FAIL_TOTAL ,T.RESERVED1 FROM (SELECT SUM(R.SUCC_COUNT) AS SUCC_TOTAL,SUM(R.FAIL_COUNT) AS FAIL_TOTAL, R.RESERVED1 FROM UMS_MSG_SEND S, SDK_SMS_REPORT_2101 R WHERE S.RESERVED1 = R.RESERVED1 GROUP BY R.RESERVED1) T, UMS_MSG_SEND U WHERE t.reserved1 = u.reserved1
